mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE (sender_id = #{user1Id} AND receiver_id = #{user2Id}) OR (sender_id = #{user2Id} AND receiver_id = #{user1Id}) ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = #{currentUserId} AND is_read = FALSE GROUP BY sender_id
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_messages SET is_read = TRUE WHERE sender_id = #{senderId} AND receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND is_read = FALSE
